name: Tiny Bubbles
detailed_description:
Tiny Bubbles will be released soon!

Get notified when it comes out by clicking the ADD TO YOUR WISHLIST button above! Keep up with development by joining our Discord or Signup to get email alerts.


What the press is saying

GeekWire: "plays like no other puzzle game" - Tim Ellis
Hardcore Gamer: "a truly enjoyable challenge" - Kirstin Swalley
Touch Arcade: "blown away with the level of depth. One of the titles from PAX I'm most excited to play when it finally comes out." - Eli Hodapp
"breathtakingly slick and creative action" - Rob Funnell


About the Game

Tiny Bubbles is an organic puzzle game about playing with clusters of realistic soap bubbles in a microscopic aquatic world. Using a proprietary Molecular Dynamics Engine, the game's physics plays like no other game. Color blind option available.

Innovative New Gameplay

Winning multiple awards for its unique gameplay, Tiny Bubbles takes gaming into the organic world. Fill bubbles with colored air and push nearby bubbles around using the physics of pressure and surface tension. Break edges between neighbors and mix colors to create matches of 4 or more. Make moves in real-time with a Tetris-like queue that lets you build up cascading chain reactions.

170+ Handmade Puzzles

Experience deep gameplay with surprising new challenges down every path. Each puzzle requires new thinking and twisting strategies. Play three game types in 7 worlds: puzzle, arcade, and infinity.

Lifelike Soap Bubble Physics

Based on the unique artistic vision of designer Stu Denman and his world-renowned scientist grandfather Cyril Stanley Smith, the game brings to life the beauty of nature to your screen. Incredibly fluid Molecular Dynamics Engine animates bubbles at 60 FPS.

Relaxing And Atmospheric

Adaptive ambient music gracefully integrates with the satisfying sounds of popping. Put on a pair of headphones and get your brain in the zen-zone.

Mesmerizing Creatures

Save microscopic aquatic creatures that are trapped in the bubbles. Avoid greedy jelly crabs and spiky urchins. A curious fish named "bloop" will reveal your nature as an optimist or a pessimist.

Awesome Powerups

Are the puzzles too challenging? Earn wild bubbles by making longer chains. Additional bonuses for collecting the right colors and making matches of 7 or longer. Earn color shufflers, boundary expanders and other powerups to use just at the right moment for epic wins!

Colorblind Mode

Featuring an innovative colorblind mode that provides an authentic experience without intrusive icons or patterns.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Vista, 7, 8 or later
  • Processor: 2GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Shader Model 3.0, OpenGL
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Steam client required.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 or later
  • Processor: 2GHz or faster
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL3 or better
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Steam client required.
